definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Paralanguage , including body language, has been extensively studied in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: 包括身體語言，已被廣泛地研究社會心理學。

sentences.english: Social psychologists always are interested in inter-group behavior researches.
sentences.chinese: 羣際行爲研究一直是社會心理學家的興趣所在。

sentences.english: Mister want, I can only offer eight thousand, Mister smile.
sentences.chinese: 老總想要，我卻只開價八千，老總會心一笑。

sentences.english: Even if we have safe belt will still feel wrought up.
sentences.chinese: 即使掛着保險帶你也會心顫肉跳。

sentences.english: The work appears in the Journal of Experimental Social Psychology. [Shiri Lev-Ari and Boaz Keysar, http://bit.ly/cFsPEf]
sentences.chinese: 它的內容發表在《實驗社會心理學》期刊上。

sentences.english: Hearty chuckles from the early morning crowd just settling into their seats.
sentences.chinese: 一早進入會場落座的人羣裏傳來會心的笑聲。

sentences.english: I like to look up at the blue sky , see the birds chirping and smile .
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡擡頭看藍天，聽小鳥唧唧的叫，然後會心一笑。

sentences.english: The 'halo effect' is a classic finding in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: “光環效應”是社會心理學裏的一個經典的發現。

sentences.english: Make sure your work gives you something to smile about before you send it out.
sentences.chinese: 在你發佈作品之前，請確保你的作品能讓你會心一笑。

sentences.english: So the two branch of social psychologies will exist and develop eternally.
sentences.chinese: 兩種取向的社會心理學將永遠存在和發展下去。

sentences.english: He laughed the same hearty laugh of almost fifteen years before.
sentences.chinese: 他會心的笑幾乎和十五年前的笑一模一樣。

sentences.english: The hall was resounded with knowing laughter.
sentences.chinese: 現場頓時又響起一陣會心的笑聲。

sentences.english: Attitude theory is a important program of social psychology research.
sentences.chinese: 態度理論是社會心理學研究的一個重要課題。

sentences.english: The very few who knew exchanged celestial grins.
sentences.chinese: 很少幾個人只好招以會心的微笑。

sentences.english: Psychosocial theories, including re-emerging ones, increased in ESM and JRME.
sentences.chinese: 社會心理學理論，包括那些重生的理論，在。

definition: to feel embarrassed or awkward/to make things difficult (for someone)/to find things difficult (to do or manage)
to ask oneself/to search one's soul/to reach a conclusion after weighing a matter
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
